text: Ramón Berdomás (24 April 1900 - 19 April 1963) was a Spanish swimmer. He competed in the water polo at the 1920 Summer Olympics and the men's 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay event at the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1900 births Category:1963 deaths Category:Spanish male swimmers Category:Spanish male water polo players Category:Olympic swimmers of Spain Category:Olympic water polo players of Spain Category:Water polo players at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Swimmers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Swimmers from Barcelona
